member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Execute PostSharp.

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the task.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.AttachDebugger
member.summary: If true, the method . will be invoked before the execution of PostSharp, given the opportunity to attach a debugger to the building process.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.ClientAttachDebugger
member.summary: If true, the method . will be invoked before the execution of PostSharp, given the opportunity to attach a debugger to the building process.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.DisableReflection
member.summary: If true, user assemblies will not be loaded into the CLR. This behavior is typically desired when user assemblies are linked against the Compact Framework or Silverlight.

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.Execute
member.summary: Executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task was successful, otherwise false.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.ExitCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the exit code of PostSharp.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.ExpectedMessages
member.summary: A list of semicolon-separated message codes that are expected during the execution of PostSharp. The task will fail if some expected message was not emitted.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.FailOnUnexpectedMessage
member.summary: If true, this MSBuild task will fail if the task emits some message that was not listed in , even if this message is not an error.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of process that will host PostSharp. Valid values are Native, Managed, and PipeServer.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.IgnoreError
member.summary: If true, this MSBuild task will return successfully even in case of error.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the assembly to be processed.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.InputReferenceDirectory
member.summary: Directory according to which the property should be resolved, if a relative filename is given in .

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the user license key.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.NoLogo
member.summary: Indicates that the PostSharp tag line should not be printed.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.PipeTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout, in millisecond, of communication between the MSBuild task and the pipe server. The default value is -1 (infinite).

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.Project
member.summary: Gets or sets the PostSharp project to be executed. Required.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the proerties passed to the PostSharp project.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.TargetPlatform
member.summary: Gets or sets the platform (a combination of CLR version and processor architecture) under which PostSharp should be started. Valid values are 2.0-x86, 2.0-x64, 4.0-x86, and 4.0-x64.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20.TraceCategories
member.summary: A semicolon-separated list of trace categories that should be enabled.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Checks the kind of key being used to sign an assembly. If the key is a PFX, exports the SNK from it, sets the to the path of this key and sets the property to true

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.KeyFile
member.summary: Full path to the key file.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.PostSharpKeyFile
member.summary: After task execution, gets the full path of the key that should be used to sign the assembly after PostSharp.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.PublicKeyFile
member.summary: After task execution, gets the full path to the public key.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20CheckPfx.SignAfterPostSharp
member.summary: After task exection, determines whether the assembly should be signed after PostSharp execution.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20GetCurrentProjectDirectory
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Gets the directory containing the current project or targets file.

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20GetCurrentProjectDirectory.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20GetCurrentProjectDirectory.Directory
member.summary: After task execution, gets the directory containing the project or target file that invoked the task.

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20GetCurrentProjectDirectory.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Move or rename a file and retries the operation during a defined amount of time in case that a sharing violation exception occurs.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry.Destination
member.summary: Gets or sets the target file path.

member.name: M:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source file path.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for the whole operation.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp20MoveWithRetry.WarningTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout before a warning is emitted.
